personal.name: S Prajwall Narayana
personal.title: AI Engineer & Full-Stack Developer

about.title: Who I Am
about.description: AI Engineer at Colligence Research, working on state-of-the-art virtual communication platforms. Computer Science graduate from RV College of Engineering with a passion for building impactful tech solutions.

about.description:
Ernst & Young India - Cybersecurity & Cloud Architecture

Published 2 IEEE Papers in ML & Robotics

Built KnotesCentral - used by 500+ students

about.title: What I Do
about.description:
Prompt Engineering & LLM Development
Full-Stack Development with React & Node.js
AI/ML Solutions using TensorFlow & PyTorch

experience.title: AI Engineer & Prompt Engineering Researcher
experience.description: Contributing to a state-of-the-art virtual communication platform leveraging advanced technologies. Focused on seamless integration of best-in-class features for unified and comprehensive communication and collaboration solutions.

experience.title: Student Intern - AI Research
experience.description: Developed a prototype model for AI-generated content and deepfake detection using CNN-based architectures. Achieved 92.3% accuracy, 90.7% precision, and 91.5% recall on benchmark deepfake datasets (FaceForensics++ and DFDC).

experience.title: Associate Consultant Intern
experience.description: Gained expertise in Enterprise Security Architecture and Cybersecurity through work on the IFTAS Cloud project. Applied the SABSA Framework for risk-driven design, cloud security, IAM, and regulatory compliance in financial systems.

experience.title: Research & Development Projects
experience.description: Led multiple research projects including IoT rover development with YOLO-based object detection and plant disease classification using ResNet50. Published research papers in IEEE conferences.

experience.title: Open Source Contributor
experience.description: Actively contributed to open-source projects and maintained personal repositories. Developed tools like sqlite2sql converter and KnotesCentral platform.

education.title: Bachelor of Engineering - Computer Science
education.description: Completed comprehensive coursework in Data Structures, Algorithms, Database Management, Software Engineering, and Computer Networks. Maintained strong academic performance while actively participating in coding competitions and technical projects.

projects.title: Arogya-Sathi
projects.subtitle: AI Healthcare Platform
projects.description: Multilingual, AI-powered healthcare assistant built using Streamlit, LangChain, LLaMA 3.2, YOLOv8, OCR & OpenStreetMap. Features include a chatbot, report analyzer, and symptom checker with 93% accuracy.

projects.title: LLM_Terminal
projects.subtitle: CLI AI Assistant
projects.description: A terminal-based conversational tool using GPT-like LLMs for offline AI assistance. Lightweight, fast, and perfect for developers who want quick, browser-free interactions.

projects.title: IoT Robotic Rover
projects.subtitle: YOLO Object Detection
projects.description: LAN-controlled rover with robotic arm and YOLOv3 object detection. Web interface and real-time streaming powered by ESP32s and OpenCV.

projects.title: Plant Disease Detection
projects.subtitle: ResNet50 Classifier
projects.description: ResNet50-based classifier with tuned hyperparameters for plant disease recognition. Boosts generalizability across diverse datasets.

projects.title: Deepfake Detection
projects.subtitle: AI Content Verification
projects.description: AI content verification system using ML techniques for detecting synthetic audio and images. Targets misinformation & media authenticity.

projects.title: KnotesCentral
projects.subtitle: Academic Platform
projects.description: Resource-sharing platform for RVCE students built in TypeScript & React. Hosts notes, lab manuals, and exam resources for academic ease.

projects.title: sqlite2sql Converter
projects.subtitle: Database Migration Tool
projects.description: Python tool to convert SQLite schemas into SQL scripts. Useful for database migration and platform transitions.

projects.title: NexusBallz
projects.subtitle: Interactive JS Game
projects.description: Fun browser-based game demonstrating front-end dev skills: JS logic, CSS transitions, and DOM manipulation.

achievements.title: IEEE Publications
achievements.description: Published 2 research papers in IEEE conferences on IoT robotics and machine learning applications.

achievements.title: Arogya-Sathi Project Award
achievements.description: Secured 3rd Best Major Project in CSE Dept at RVCE for developing an AI-powered multilingual healthcare assistant using LLMs, YOLOv8, RAG, and microservices architecture.

achievements.title: NSS RVCE Recognition
achievements.description: Recognized by RVCE Management and RSST Trust for contributions to NSS as Content Head and Core Team Member. Led impactful events like Utsarga, health camps, and plantation drives.

achievements.title: Open Source Contributor
achievements.description: Active contributor to open-source projects with multiple repositories and community contributions on GitHub.

achievements.title: Project Leadership
achievements.description: Led multiple technical projects combining hardware and software development with innovative solutions.

achievements.title: Community Impact
achievements.description: Created educational resources and tools benefiting 500+ students and the developer community.

achievements.title: Coding Competitions
achievements.description: Regular participant in competitive programming contests and hackathons with strong problem-solving skills.
